basics.name: Kaï-Zen Berg-Šæmañn
basics.label: Senior DevOps/Site Reliability expert with AWS proficiency.
basics.summary:
With over 14 years of work experience, I am a seasoned site reliability engineer and infrastructure solutions specialist, passionate about designing and implementing robust, scalable, and high-performance systems. I have a strong background in DevOps, Linux, and cloud computing, and I am proficient in various tools and services, such as AWS, Nix, Docker and Terraform.

As a site reliability engineer at IOHK, I have been involved in various projects and initiatives, such as deploying and maintaining monitoring and alerting systems, developing and automating deployment pipelines, conducting incident response and root cause analysis, and collaborating with development teams to improve application performance, reliability, and scalability. I have also leveraged infrastructure-as-code principles to codify and automate the provisioning and management of cloud infrastructure, enhancing scalability and reducing manual configuration efforts.

work.name: Flo-Fab Inc
work.summary: Responsible for developing the production dashboard from scratch for Flo-Fab’s new internal system, using ASP.NET Core for the backend, React for the frontend, and MSSQL for the database. As part of a cohort of 3 students, worked alongside Flo-Fab’s internal development team to design, implement, and refine a key component of the system. Involved in both backend and frontend development, contributing to the full stack while adhering to project specifications.
highlights: Implemented API endpoints and developed responsive UI components for the production dashboard using ASP.NET Core, React, and MSSQL.
Integrated testing frameworks into the project and implemented unit and integration tests to ensure system reliability.
Created a CI pipeline to improve the build and integration process, enhancing development workflow.
Actively used version control (Git) for collaboration and change management.
Reviewed pull requests to ensure code quality and adherence to project standards.
Followed Agile and Scrum methodologies, participating in regular sprints, standups, and backlog grooming to manage project tasks and progress.
Collaborated with fellow students and Flo-Fab’s developers to build and refine the production dashboard based on project specifications.
